summary: The diff shows changes to `Header.tsx`, but the provided snippet is truncated and does not conclusively demonstrate that the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger/control was removed from all header contexts (desktop and mobile). Additionally, `project_state.json` was modified, which is unrelated to the requested UI-only change.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Share option UI control rendered in the app header (the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger button) and keep the rest of the header layout/behavior unchanged.
missing_requirements.reason: The `Header.tsx` diff is truncated before the full header (notably the mobile menu section). While the visible portion does not show a share trigger, the truncated portion could still render a Share button/menu entry, so the removal cannot be verified from the provided diff summary alone.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Header.tsx (truncated; ends around the Mobile Menu Button section)

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically to remove the Share option button from the header and avoid unrelated changes. Editing `project_state.json` is not requested and appears unrelated to removing a header UI control.
